thread.title: BRIEF-Inogen Sees FY 2018 Revenue $298 Million To $308 Million

title: BRIEF-Inogen Sees FY 2018 Revenue $298 Million To $308 Million
text: February 27, 2018 / 9:34 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Inogen Sees FY 2018 Revenue $298 Million To $308 Million Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Inogen Inc: * INOGEN ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND UPDATES 2018 GUIDANCE * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 25.4 PERCENT TO $63.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $298 MILLION TO $308 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 19.5 TO 23.5 PERCENT * ‍RAISES 2018 GUIDANCE​ * ‍INOGEN EXPECTS RENTAL REVENUE TO BE RELATIVELY FLAT IN 2018 COMPARED TO 2017 AS COMPANY CONTINUES TO FOCUS ON SALES VERSUS RENTALS​ * ‍INOGEN IS MAINTAINING ITS GUIDANCE RANGE FOR FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $60 TO $64 MILLION​ * ‍EXPECTS NET POSITIVE CASH FLOW FOR 2018 WITH NO ADDITIONAL EQUITY CAPITAL REQUIRED TO MEET ITS CURRENT OPERATING PLAN​ * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE ‍$0.03​ * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $61.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $302.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
